title: Killing Floor v1047 ~SteamWorks~
description:
This is a full game torrent for Killing Floor v1047 if you need instructions on install this please vist this link below.


Text instructions:

1. Mount or burn

2. Run the Setup (Run as Administrator)

3. It will ask you if you wanna install with or without steam (its your choice.)

4. At the end it will ask you if you wanna run the extra program setups (dont run these. Uncheck them)


5. Go back to the mounted ISO file and Open FK_Data1

6. Drag all folders from the RaR over to the install directory (C:UsersUSERNAMEProgramFiles(x86)Killing Floor or C:UsersUSERNAMEProgramFiles(x86)SteamSteamAppsCommonKilling Floor (Merge and copy replace EVERYTHING!) 


7. Go to the system folder and make a shortcut (C:UsersUSERNAMEProgramFiles(x86)Killing FloorSystem or C:UsersUSERNAMEProgramFiles(x86)SteamSteamAppsCommonKilling Floorsystem) then find the KillingFloor.exe file and create a shortcut

8. Open rev.ini in the install directory and where it says "PlayerName= ClassickBK" change the ClassickBK to whatever you want your username to be!

9. Enjoy. :)





This is for educational purposes only. What you do with this knowledge is your own responsibility! I am not responsible for any negative out comes that may happen with the process. (There is not virus in these files. You can scan them yourself. I use Norton and I never even got false positives.) This is the full game. If you would like to play online just use Tunngle. Although this should work with steam too. Just launch it from the shortcut. Not steam. Enjoy.

PowerISO: http://www.poweriso.com/download.htm
WinRaR: http://www.win-rar.com/download.html?&L=0
